title: Charming classic rowhome **Fully furnished** 3br 2ba
description:
FULLY FURNISHED. Available Dec 1. A modern update on a classic Philadelphia rowhome with custom details and vintage touches. This 3 bedroom/2 bathroom home was meticulously rebuilt from the studs. Outdoor space on every floor, tons of natural light, close to Frankford Ave, and a 7 minute walk from the El. This block is quiet and full of families on the block.
Walk through the oversized wood and glass vintage front door into a serene, light-filled living room, dining room, and kitchen thanks to windows on three sides of the home. Huge custom front window, craftsman-built metal staircase, concrete kitchen countertops and reclaimed wood cabinet fronts are just a few of the special features in this home that you won't find anywhere else. Central Air. Nest thermostat included.
This house has tons of character with countless special details throughout. A quiet residential block with easy access to Martha Bar, Zig Zag, Loco Pez, Atlantis: The Lost Bar, Philly Brewing Company, Franny Lou’s Porch, boutique shops and thrift stores, and all that Frankford Ave and Front Street have to offer. Plus, it’s just three blocks from the El.
Pictures available in direct messages.

title: Apartment for rent
description: Nestled in the desirable East Passyunk area of South Philadelphia, this fully remodeled bi-level 2 bed 1 bathroom apartment will be available mid-November 2022. Accompanied by myriad upgrades including central air and a freshly painted foyer this enchanting apartment is waiting for you to call it home. As you enter this winsome apartment be welcomed by a spacious living room and kitchen area.  The kitchen boasts upgraded appliances and brand-new cabinets, and the bathroom has been gloriously remodeled to provide a modern vibe with built-in shelving for extra storage for your towels or personal belongings. The spacious master bedroom includes ample closet space and two huge windows allowing for the warmth of natural light. The versatile second bedroom could be used as an office or a den, or even a walk-in closet for the tenet with a heavy wardrobe. Only a short stroll from E. Passyunk Avenue, which is dotted with outstanding restaurants and quaint little shops that you will be sure to love. Conveniently located two blocks away from Snyder Station as well as easy access to major highways like 95 & 76. Don't miss the opportunity to make this charming new apartment listing, your new home. title: Awesome 3BD for rent
description: Great property available for RENT starting immediately! This single family home with a cozy covered front porch is located in Hatboro Borough, and features new carpeting and fresh paint throughout most of this home. The great room and kitchen are located in the rear, with soaring 2-story vaulted ceilings with skylights and new luxury vinyl plank floors, with sliding glass doors to the deck and fenced rear yard. The kitchen features oak cabinets, new stainless steel refrigerator and new stainless steel gas range, a built-in microwave oven and a dishwasher. The mud room is off the side entry and leads to the first floor laundry room, kitchen and living room. There are three bedrooms, two are located on the first floor, along with a full bathroom. The second floor features a large loft area, great for a home office or playroom, and a main bedroom suite with a private full bathroom, sitting room or office/play area. Other features include gas heat and central air conditioning, full basement, gas cooking and a shed in the fenced rear yard. Great location in a great neighborhood, Hatboro/Horsham school district, and just minutes to County Line Rd, York Rd and the PA Turnpike - and a short walk to downtown Hatboro! Pets allowed on a case by case basis.
